msg: SOLR-2535: REGRESSION: in Solr 3.x and trunk the admin/file handler fails to show directory listings

author: rhuijben
msg: Make sure an error on 'svn upgrade F:\wc\subdir' correctly says that 'F:\wc'
Impossible to upgrade working copies in dirent roots like 'F:\'.
(Users would never see those, as those were broken pre 1.7).
And handle excluded paths, like the other hidden conditions.

author: rwonly
msg: GEGERONIMO-5764 try start all the "resolved" bundle after Geronimo modules started. This is a work around for a bundle recorded in startup.properties and depends on some geronimo plugin bundles. Even we set its startlevel higher than 60, it still can not start correctly after a clean cache. This could be deleted after we smooth out geronimo life cycle with osgi.
